comments: Faint, red afterglow: very high-z. ROTSE detection at 16s.
Possible high-z GRB near galactic plane.
V-band dropout: high-z or dusty host.
Very long burst during full moon; complex early behavior seen in rapid ground response. Very red afterglow.
High redshift burst with nearby low-z galaxy.
Bright, long GRB with afterglow. Extremely high-z host galaxy in HST imaging.
Very bright GRB. LAT detection above 1 GeV. Ultra-energetic.
Galactic plane; huge extinction. Very fast early optical flare.
DLA at z~4; still detected with UVOT.
Long, high-z burst. Long optical plateau.
MAXI detection. Faint, probably high-z afterglow.
